name: shopmern
description: Work with a partner to add comments describing the functionality of the code found in [24-Stu_Stripe/Unsolved/client/src/components/Cart/index.js](24-Stu_Stripe/Unsolved/client/src/components/Cart/index.js).

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
